Crush Price.Description: Crush price. For reference, in 2019-2020, average price for Shiraz was $697 per tonnec, and for Chardonnay was ~$450 per tonne.

Maximum irrigation mm per phenology.Description: Maximum irrigation depth (applied to all phenological stages if float; alternatively per phenological stage if list of length 5)

Maximum daily irrigation mm per phenolog.Description: Maximum daily irrigation depth (applied to all phenological stages if float; alternatively per phenological stage if list of length 5)

Soil water irrigation trigger per phenol.Description: Critical percentage of extractable soil water to trigger an irrigation for each major growth stage (applied to all phenological stages if float; alternatively per phenological stage if list of length 5)

Soil water irrigation defict refill perc.Description: The percentage of deficit to refill for each major growth stage (applied to all phenological stages if float; alternatively per phenological stage if list of length 5)

Days between irrigation applications per.Description: Days before next irrigation can occur for each major growth stage (applied to all phenological stages if float; alternatively per phenological stage if list of length 5)

Water delivery cost.Description: Variable water delivery cost; CIT on-peak is $60 per ML

Water market cost.Description: Water market price at purchase. This is not used if entitlement exceeds irrigation volume. Note: $401 per ML is volume-weighted average Price for 2019-2020

Cost per spray.Description: Cost of average spray pass, including chemical, labour and fuel costs; can alternatively estimate from rowwise distance, rate, fuel efficiency, labour rate, ...

Cost per tip.Description: Cost of average spray pass, including labour and fuel costs; can alternatively estimate from rowwise distance, rate, fuel efficiency, labour rate, ...

Number of sprays.Description: Number of spray applications for season

Number of tips.Description: Number of spray applications for season
